scripts:
create path (sling:OrderedFolder) /content/dam/vida
        create path (nt:unstructured) /content/dam/vida/jcr:content
        set properties on /content/dam/vida/jcr:content
        set cq:conf{String} to /conf/vida
        set jcr:title{String} to "Vida"
        end
create service user vida-reader-service
    set ACL on /conf, /etc,/content
        allow jcr:read for vida-reader-service
    end

create path (sling:OrderedFolder) /content/dam/vida
        create path (nt:unstructured) /content/dam/vida/jcr:content
        set properties on /content/dam/vida/jcr:content
        set cq:conf{String} to /conf/vida
        set jcr:title{String} to "Vida"
        end
create service user vida-writer-service
    set ACL on /conf, /etc,/content
        allow jcr:all for vida-writer-service
    end

create path (sling:OrderedFolder) /content/dam/vida
        create path (nt:unstructured) /content/dam/vida/jcr:content
        set properties on /content/dam/vida/jcr:content
        set cq:conf{String} to /conf/vida
        set jcr:title{String} to "Vida"
        end
create service user vida-read-write-service
    set ACL on /conf, /etc,/content,/var
        allow jcr:all for vida-read-write-service
    end
